list.description: Vehicle tracking offers a range of benefits, from saving money, to gaining the ability to settle disputes over working hours and fuel claims. Benefits include:
items: Save money - by reducing both fuel costs and vehicle wear and tear
Make money - by creating a more efficient mobile workforce and cutting delivery times
Gain insights - into employee driving behaviours, utilising correctional training in fuel-efficient driving & reducing vehicle strain
Geo-fencing alerts - tells you when a vehicle leaves its designated route or area

options.title: Fuel Savings
options.description: There are several ways in which being able to track your fleet will also enable you to cut fuel costs, some examples include:

prosList.description: The ability to track speed patterens will help with fuel efficiency
Reducing engine idle time will reduce fuel consumption
Easily record fuel purchases, aiding the management of fuel expenses

options.title: Route Planning and Management
options.description: To become profitable and streamlined, a company must optimise their route planning - Tracking enables truely efficient and reactive route management.

prosList.description: Real-time traffic updates warn drivers of any traffic delays and redirects them to another route
Tracking assists in finding the optimum route for fuel efficiency
Geo-fencing enables alerts to be set, notifying you in the event of a vehicle leaving its' designated route or area
See where every tracked vehicle is at any given time and receive immediate updates about any issues

options.title: Employee Safety
options.description: Keeping your employees safe has now been made a little easier with the help of advanced vehicle tracking systems. Find peace of mind, knowing:

prosList.description: The video or still images captured by the tracking system can assist in the event of an accident or stolen vehicles, increasing employee safety
Active fleet management allows for identifying poor driving habits, such as speeding or harsh breakes
Gain transparency through analytics - identify unnecessary idleness or the driver's adherence to traffic laws
Training programs can be offered where needed to improve drivers' safety on the road

options.title: Theft Prevention
options.description: A loss of income, shaken confidence, and detrimental effects on your business overall mean vehicle security and protection needs to be a priority.

prosList.description: Alerts and notifactions can be activated to ensure security via the vehicle tracking system
A stolen vehicle can be easily tracked down
If there is a sudden change in a vehicle's planned route or it moves without authorisation, an alarm will be triggered
In case of emergency, several functions can be activated remotely from the device, such as engine immobilisation, and central locking system, etc.

options.title: Compliance
options.description: Complying with the law is paramount, unfortunately fleet compliance can be complex. Vehicle tracking can help simplify it - by streamlining compliance management into a single application, making it accurate and automated, enabling you to easily align processes with policy.

prosList.description: Vehicle diagnostic reports set automated reminders for vehicle servicing and notiy the service centers and drivers
Monitoring a vehicle's current location will help improve communications with customers - ultimately leading to an improved customer service
Tracking reports assist in framing fleet management strategies
GPS vehicle tracking records are monitored by the insurance companies to adjust and reduce the charges - ensuring you are never overcharged
